thread.title: BRIEF-‍N26 Has Raised $160 Million In A Series C Funding Round Co-Led By Allianz X

title: BRIEF-‍N26 Has Raised $160 Million In A Series C Funding Round Co-Led By Allianz X
text: March 20, 2018 / 7:14 AM / Updated an hour ago BRIEF-‍N26 Has Raised $160 Million In A Series C Funding Round Co-Led By Allianz X Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 20 (Reuters) - * ‍N26 - HAS RAISED $160 MILLION IN A SERIES C FUNDING ROUND CO-LED BY ALLIANZ X, DIGITAL INVESTMENT UNIT OF ALLIANZ GROUP, AND TENCENT HOLDINGS LTD​ * ‍N26 - TOTAL FUNDS RAISED AS OF MARCH 20 ARE $215 MILLION​ * N26- ‍FUNDING REPRESENTS LARGEST EQUITY FINANCING ROUND IN FINTECH INDUSTRY IN GERMANY; WILL BE USED TO ACCELERATE GROWTH STRATEGY, PRODUCT VISION​ Source text for Eikon:
